name: Anachronism\>
description:
A letter fell through your door, containing the install disk to a new communication service called RemoteBoards. Install the contents and chat with friends, or strangers, whoever you can find!

Be nice, be nasty, be yourself, or someone else. There's no right way to exist, so it's up to you to decide.
Log in and learn about the people out there, and maybe even about yourself.
(Just make sure you think twice before hitting enter)

Features

  • 90's inspired text-based graphics
  • 14 chapters of branching paths
  • Hundreds of ways through the story
  • A handful of virtual friends to make

I Hope to See You Online One Day,

- JinX
